data.name: Privacy.Title
data.value: Privacy notice

data.name: Privacy.IfYouUse
data.value: If you use the 'Check if you need to report packaging data' tool, Defra will:

data.name: Privacy.BeTheDataController
data.value: be the data controller

data.name: Privacy.BeResponsibleFor
data.value: be responsible for processing any data you share with them

data.name: Privacy.ADataController
data.value: A data controller determines how and why personal data is processed. For more information, read Defra’s entry in the

data.name: Privacy.DataProtectionPublic
data.value: Data Protection Public Register.

data.name: Privacy.WhatDataWeCollect
data.value: What data we collect

data.name: Privacy.ThePersonalData
data.value: The personal data we collect from you includes:

data.name: Privacy.YourInternetProtocol
data.value: your Internet Protocol (IP) address, and details of which version of

data.name: Privacy.WebBrowser
data.value: web browser

data.name: Privacy.YouUsed
data.value: you used

data.name: Privacy.InformationOnHowYou
data.value: information on how you use the site,

data.name: Privacy.UsingCookies
data.value: using cookies

data.name: Privacy.AndPageTagging
data.value: and page tagging techniques

data.name: Privacy.QuestionsQueriesOrFeedback
data.value: questions, queries or feedback you leave

data.name: Privacy.PublishAndManage
data.value: publish and manage their own privacy notice with details of how to contact them

data.name: Privacy.WhereYouProvide
data.value: Where you provide your consent, we use

data.name: Privacy.GoogleAnalytics
data.value: Google Analytics

data.name: Privacy.AndAzureSentinel
data.value: and Azure Sentinel to collect information about how you use GOV.UK. This includes IP addresses.

data.name: Privacy.GoogleAnalyticsProcesses
data.value: Google Analytics processes information about:

data.name: Privacy.ThePagesYouVisit
data.value: the pages you visit on GOV.UK

data.name: Privacy.HowLongYouSpend
data.value: how long you spend on each GOV.UK page

data.name: Privacy.HowYouGotTo
data.value: how you got to the site

data.name: Privacy.WhatYouClickOn
data.value: what you click on while you’re visiting the site

data.name: Privacy.WeMakeSure
data.value: We make sure you cannot be directly identified by Google Analytics data. We do this by using

data.name: Privacy.GoogleAnalyticsIpAddressAnonymisation
data.value: Google Analytics' IP address anonymisation

data.name: Privacy.FeatureAndByRemoving
data.value: feature and by removing any other personal data from the titles or URLs of the pages you visit.

data.name: Privacy.WeWillNotCombine
data.value: We will not combine analytics information with other data sets in a way that would directly identify who you are.

data.name: Privacy.FindOutMore
data.value: Find out more about how we use Google Analytics and other cookies on GOV.UK.

data.name: Privacy.WhyWeNeedYourData
data.value: Why we need your data

data.name: Privacy.WeCollectYourPersonal
data.value: We collect your personal data in order to:

data.name: Privacy.GatherFeedBack
data.value: gather feedback to improve our services

data.name: Privacy.RespondToAnyFeedback
data.value: respond to any feedback you send us, if you’ve asked us to

data.name: Privacy.MonitorUse
data.value: monitor use of the service to identify security threats

data.name: Privacy.MonitorThePerformance
data.value: monitor the performance of the service to identify inefficiencies and JavaScript errors

data.name: Privacy.WeUseTheInformation
data.value: We use the information we collect through Google Analytics and Azure Sentinel to see how you use GOV.UK and to see how well the service performs on your device.

data.name: Privacy.WeDoThisToHelp
data.value: We do this to help:

data.name: Privacy.MakeSureThe
data.value: make sure the 'Check if you need to report packaging data' tool is meeting the needs of its users

data.name: Privacy.MakeImprovements
data.value: make improvements to the service

data.name: Privacy.MakePerformanceImprovements
data.value: make performance improvements, for example improving page load time and data usage

data.name: Privacy.WeCombineGoogleAnalytics
data.value: We combine Google Analytics information with similar data from other government digital services to help understand and improve user journeys within GOV.UK and other government digital services.

data.name: Privacy.OurLegalBasis
data.value: Our legal basis for processing your data

data.name: Privacy.TheLegalBasis
data.value: The legal basis for processing personal data in relation to site security is our legitimate interests, and the legitimate interests of our users, in ensuring the security and integrity of GOV.UK.

data.name: Privacy.TheLegalBasisGoogleAnalytics
data.value: The legal basis for processing data collected with Google Analytics and Azure Sentinel on GOV.UK and other government digital services is your consent.

data.name: Privacy.TheLegalBasisOther
data.value: The legal basis for processing all other personal data is that it’s necessary:

data.name: Privacy.ToPerformATask
data.value: to perform a task in the public interest

data.name: Privacy.InTheExerciseOf
data.value: in the exercise of our functions as a government department

data.name: Privacy.WhatWeDoWithYourData
data.value: What we do with your data

data.name: Privacy.TheDataWeCollect
data.value: The data we collect may be shared with other government departments, agencies and public bodies. It may also be shared with our technology suppliers, for example our hosting provider.

data.name: Privacy.WeWillShareYourData
data.value: We will share your data if we are required to do so by law - for example, by court order, or to prevent fraud or other crime.

data.name: Privacy.TheDataWeCollectGoogleAnalytics
data.value: The data we collect with Google Analytics cookies is transferred and stored with Google where we analyse it with Google Analytics software (Universal Analytics). We do not allow Google to use or share this data for their own purposes.

data.name: Privacy.WeWillNot
data.value: We will not:

data.name: Privacy.SellOrRent
data.value: sell or rent your data to third parties

data.name: Privacy.ShareYourData
data.value: share your data with third parties for marketing purposes

data.name: Privacy.HowLongWeKeep
data.value: How long we keep your data

data.name: Privacy.WeWillOnlyRetain
data.value: We will only retain your personal data for as long as it is needed for the purposes set out in this document or for as long as the law requires us to.

data.name: Privacy.WeWill
data.value: We will:

data.name: Privacy.KeepYourFeedbackData
data.value: keep your feedback data for 2 years

data.name: Privacy.DeleteAccessLogData
data.value: delete access log data which contain your IP address after 90 days

data.name: Privacy.WhereYourDataIsProcessed
data.value: Where your data is processed and stored

data.name: Privacy.WeDesignBuildAndRun
data.value: We design, build and run our systems to make sure that your data is as safe as possible at all stages, both while it’s processed and when it’s stored.

data.name: Privacy.AllPersonalData
data.value: All personal data is stored in the

data.name: Privacy.EuropeanEconomicArea
data.value: European Economic Area

data.name: Privacy.DataCollectedByGoogleAnalytics
data.value: (EEA). Data collected by Google Analytics and Azure Sentinel may be transferred outside the EEA for processing.

data.name: Privacy.HowWeProtect
data.value: How we protect your data and keep it secure

data.name: Privacy.WeAreCommitted
data.value: We are committed to doing all that we can to keep your data secure. We have set up systems and processes to prevent unauthorised access or disclosure of your data - for example, we protect your data using varying levels of encryption.

data.name: Privacy.WeAlsoMakeSure
data.value: We also make sure that any third parties that we deal with keep all personal data they process on our behalf secure.

data.name: Privacy.YourRights
data.value: Your rights

data.name: Privacy.YouHaveTheRightToRequest
data.value: You have the right to request:

data.name: Privacy.InformationAbout
data.value: information about how your personal data is processed

data.name: Privacy.ACopyOf
data.value: a copy of that personal data

data.name: Privacy.ThatAnythingInaccurate
data.value: that anything inaccurate in your personal data is corrected immediately

data.name: Privacy.YouCanAlso
data.value: You can also:

data.name: Privacy.RaiseAnObjection
data.value: raise an objection about how your personal data is processed

data.name: Privacy.RequestThatYour
data.value: request that your personal data is erased if there is no longer a justification for it

data.name: Privacy.AskThatTheProcessing
data.value: ask that the processing of your personal data is restricted in certain circumstances

data.name: Privacy.IfYouHaveAny
data.value: If you have any of these requests, email

data.name: Privacy.LinksToOtherWebsites
data.value: Links to other websites

data.name: Privacy.ContainsLinksToOtherWebsites
data.value: GOV.UK contains links to other websites.

data.name: Privacy.ThisPrivacyNotice
data.value: This privacy notice only applies to the annual health and welfare review service on GOV.UK, and does not cover other government services and transactions that we link to. These services have their own terms and conditions and privacy policies.

data.name: Privacy.FollowingALinkToAnother
data.value: Following a link to another website

data.name: Privacy.IfYouGoTo
data.value: If you go to another website from this one, read the privacy policy on that website to find out what it does with your information.

data.name: Privacy.FollowingALinkToGovUk
data.value: Following a link to GOV.UK from another website

data.name: Privacy.IfYouComeTo
data.value: If you come to GOV.UK from another website, we may receive personal information from the other website. You should read the privacy policy of the website you came from to find out more about this.

data.name: Privacy.ContactUs
data.value: Contact us or make a complaint

data.name: Privacy.DefrasPersonal
data.value: Defra’s Personal Information Charter

data.name: Privacy.ExplainsDefrasStandards
data.value: explains Defra’s standards for requesting and storing personal information.

data.name: Privacy.DefrasDataProtectionOfficer
data.value: Defra’s Data Protection Officer

data.name: Privacy.TheDpoProvides
data.value: The DPO provides independent advice and monitoring of our use of personal information.

data.name: Privacy.InformationCommissioner
data.value: Information Commissioner

data.name: Privacy.YouAlsoHave
data.value: You also have the right to make a complaint to the

data.name: Privacy.WhoIsAnIndependent
data.value: , who is an independent regulator.

data.name: Privacy.Telephone
data.value: Telephone:

data.name: Privacy.Textphone
data.value: Textphone:

data.name: Privacy.MondayToFriday
data.value: Monday to Friday, 9am to 4.30pm

data.name: Privacy.FindOutAboutCallCharges
data.value: Find out about call charges

data.name: Privacy.ChangesToThisPolicy
data.value: Changes to this policy

data.name: Privacy.WeMayChange
data.value: We may change this privacy policy. In that case, the ‘last updated’ date at the bottom of this page will also change. Any changes to this privacy policy will apply to you and your data immediately.

data.name: Privacy.IfTheseChanges
data.value: If these changes affect how your personal data is processed, Defra will take reasonable steps to let you know.

data.name: Privacy.LastUpdated
data.value: Last updated
